about_the_game:
Want to add your own music to Retrowave? This is now possible!

This DLC allows you to add your own audio files in a folder to add them to the game!

A long and wonderful music playlist is already available in game, it is better to play with the music already present and support the artists, but if you really want to have your own music in Retrowave, it is now possible!
